round_best: Develop a meta-decision framework that uses AI-modulated selective memory reinforcement, where an agent dynamically regulates the information it retains or forgets after each decision-making iteration based on a pre-defined regret threshold. This AI system would incrementally adjust its memory retention strategies by referencing both internal performance metrics (past regrets and successes) and external informational cues. The system integrates real-time feedback loops to update its strategies, effectively balancing the cognitive load and optimizing decision efficacy across varied and unpredictable environments.
